Package model.board

Interface Chessboard

public interface Chessboard
Interface for a simple chessboard.

  • Method Details

    • getAllPieces

      List<Piece> getAllPieces()
      Return all pieces in chessboard.
      Returns:
      a list of all pieces on the board

    • move

      void move(Position actualPos, Position finalPos)
      Move a piece to a position to an another one.
      Parameters:
      actualPos - the initial position of the piece
      finalPos - the position where the piece want to move

    • getxBorder

      int getxBorder()
      This method is useful for pieces to calculate their possible moves.
      Returns:
      X chessboard's border

    • getyBorder

      int getyBorder()
      This method is useful for pieces to calculate their possible moves.
      Returns:
      Y chessboard's border

    • getPieceOnPosition

      Optional<Piece> getPieceOnPosition(Position selectedPos)
      Try to get a piece from a position if it exist.
      Parameters:
      selectedPos - The position to check
      Returns:
      an optional of piece

    • getAllPosition

      List<Position> getAllPosition(Piece attacker)
      From a piece it return all its allowed position.
      Parameters:
      attacker - every piece is allowed
      Returns:
      a list of all possible position

    • promotion

      Piece promotion(Name namePiece)
      Pawn get promoted to a new Piece.
      Parameters:
      namePiece - the name of the new piece
      Returns:
      the new piece

    • isCastling

      boolean isCastling(Piece piece, Position targetPos)
      From a piece and a position it checks if the piece is castling.
      Parameters:
      piece - the king
      targetPos - the position where the king want to move
      Returns:
      true if king is castling
